ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 127
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, as far as cheap items, cast Alluring Aura on me (I believe that s 20-25 CHA), then I have 2 Opalline earrings (+5 CHA each), Silk Evening Shirt (+5 CHA),
ygData.messageBody:
Well, as far as cheap items, cast Alluring Aura on me (I believe that's
20-25 CHA), then I have 2 Opalline earrings (+5 CHA each), Silk Evening
Shirt (+5 CHA), Crude Stien (+15 CHA I think), two +4 CHA enchanter made
bracelets, and a +5 Amulet. All adds up very nicely. I get star rubies for
69pp, sapphires for 106pp I think, (might be 110p?). I can sell Gauntlets
back to an indifferent for 226 I think, maybe 230. Works well ;-) Now, if
those danm charms were dropping more...not having good luck lately...right
now I'm 1 for 26 on the avos dropping charms...

Thanks for the info, Gaidal!
